ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage, diagonally cut into 1/4-inch slices
2 cups red and green peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces

cookingTips: Slice sausage diagonally to increase surface area for browning
Cook sausage first, then set aside and cook vegetables to maintain texture
Combine at the end with oregano to meld flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the importance of cooking components separately to maintain proper texture and combining them strategically for flavor.
